subject: Inquiry for Large Sticker Order
body:
*Dear Mohammed Neyaz,*

I hope this email finds you well. My name is Rachel Thompson, and I am
reaching out from BrightSpark Marketing Solutions, based in Seattle,
Washington, USA. I recently came across your online store and was impressed
by the variety and quality of stickers you offer.

We are planning to place a large order for stickers for an upcoming
promotional campaign. Below are the details of our requirements:

   - *Quantity:* 10,000 stickers
   - *Design:* Custom designs for our branding needs
   - *Dimensions:* 4"x4"
   - *Material:* Glossy and waterproof
   - *Delivery Timeline:* By February 15, 2025
   - *Shipping Address:* BrightSpark Marketing Solutions, 1420 Fifth
   Avenue, Suite 2000, Seattle, WA 98101, USA

Please let me know if you can accommodate this order and share the pricing
details, including bulk discounts, shipping costs, and estimated delivery
time. Additionally, if custom designs are required, kindly provide
information on the design submission process and any associated costs.

You can reach me directly at +1 (206) 555-7890 or
rachel.thompson@brightspark.com if you have any questions or need further
details.

Thank you for your time and assistance. I look forward to your response and
to working with you.

Best regards,
Rachel Thompson
Marketing Manager
BrightSpark Marketing Solutions
+1 (206) 555-7890
rachel.thompson@brightspark.com
